about_the_game:
Newton the kitten is a tourist and very curious kitten

He went to travel with his owner to an island for a vacation, but when it was time to leave Newton went to discover new things on the island and got lost!

His owner is waiting for him at the kiosk so he can catch the plane and leave, but Newton doesn't know the way to get home

Newton is lost on the island, only you can help him!

You need to unscramble the hexagonal tiles to form a path where Newton will be able to reach his owner

Your challenge is to connect all the tiles with food so that Newton the kitten can reach its owner without hunger, otherwise Newton will die of hunger on the way

Rivers, mountains and bridges will challenge you to find the best way

  • Cats and Puzzle: A cute and pleasant experience
  • Rotate the camera freely with the right mouse button
  • 52 uniquely assembled levels
  • 5 island themes with many additional mechanics
  • Original music and effects
  • Configure graphics for your computer
  • Steam Cloud and Steam Achievements

About the Game

Newton the kitten is a tourist and very curious kitten

He went to travel with his owner to an island for a vacation, but when it was time to leave Newton went to discover new things on the island and got lost!

His owner is waiting for him at the kiosk so he can catch the plane and leave, but Newton doesn't know the way to get home

Newton is lost on the island, only you can help him!

You need to unscramble the hexagonal tiles to form a path where Newton will be able to reach his owner

Your challenge is to connect all the tiles with food so that Newton the kitten can reach its owner without hunger, otherwise Newton will die of hunger on the way

Rivers, mountains and bridges will challenge you to find the best way

  • Cats and Puzzle: A cute and pleasant experience
  • Rotate the camera freely with the right mouse button
  • 52 uniquely assembled levels
  • 5 island themes with many additional mechanics
  • Original music and effects
  • Configure graphics for your computer
  • Steam Cloud and Steam Achievements
name: Newton Going Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3537u
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 735M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Newton the kitten went to travel with its owner to an island and when it was time to leave... Where's Newton? He went to explore the island and got lost! Can you swap the hex tiles to help him get back home? Help Newton the kitten in this cute and pleasant experience.
